sentence: Other fellowships included the Guggenheim 1988-1989; the Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars 1977 and 1979; Fulbright 1964-1965 and 1977; SSRC-ACLS 1966-1968; Ford Foundation, 1970; German Marshall Fund, 1979; Social Science Research Council, 1982; SSRC-Foreign Policy Studies, 1988-1989 and was made a Harold Lasswell by the American Academy of Political and Social Science.

examples.sentence: ...was returned in the 1964 united kingdom general election as labour mp for...
...nelson rockefeller in the 1964 republican party presidential primaries...
...burnaby seymour in the 1968 canadian federal election...
...ronald reagan in the 1968 republican party presidential primaries bush endorsed richard nixon...
